description.value:
The alchemist's mutagen now grants a +4 natural armor bonus, a +6 alchemical bonus to one physical ability score (Strength, Dexterity, or Constitution), and a +4 alchemical bonus to a second physical ability score. The alchemist takes a â€“2 penalty on both associated mental ability scores as long as the mutagen persists.

An alchemist must be at least 12th level before selecting this discovery.
